articles.author: Rob Picheta, Zahid Mahmood
articles.title: Ukraine will ‘no doubt’ join NATO when war with Russia ends, US defense secretary tells CNN - CNN
articles.description: The US secretary of defense told CNN on Thursday he has “no doubt” that Ukraine will become part of NATO after Russia’s war against the country ends, following a two-day summit that was dominated by the question of when Kyiv would join the alliance.
articles.content:
Watch the full interview with Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin at 6 p.m. ET on The Situation Room with Wolf Blitzer.

articles.author: Olena Harmash
articles.title: Russia attacks Kyiv for third night in a row, one killed in south Ukraine - Reuters
articles.description: Russia attacked Kyiv for a third successive night, wounding four people, and an elderly woman was killed by Russian shelling in southern Ukraine on Thursday, Ukrainian officials said.

articles.title: Russian general in Ukraine says he was fired after accusing defense ministry of betraying troops - CNN
articles.description: A senior Russian general in command of forces in occupied southern Ukraine says he was suddenly dismissed from his post after accusing Moscow’s Defense Ministry leadership of betraying his troops by not providing sufficient support.

articles.author: Joe Cash, Ellen Zhang
articles.title: China's exports fall most in three years as global economy falters - Reuters
articles.description: China's exports fell last month at their fastest pace since the onset three years ago of the COVID-19 pandemic, as an ailing global economy puts mounting pressure on Chinese policymakers for fresh stimulus measures.

articles.title: LeBron James announces he will return this fall for his 21st NBA season - CNN
articles.description: After hinting at a possible retirement following a postseason loss in May, NBA superstar LeBron James has announced he will be returning for another year of play – his 21st NBA season.
